item.title: Chef Custom Resources
item.description: Lately I’ve been writing some Chef code. One of the best things about Chef is custom resources: https://docs.chef.io/custom_resources.html Let’s see an example on how to create a Kafka topic using Chef and how to make it idempotent. Before writing any Chef code it is important to understand how to manage a topic (grouping of messages of a similar type). From the Kafka install directory, first check if the topic already exists:
